sbpipe.simul.copasi package¶

Submodules¶

sbpipe.simul.copasi.check module¶

sbpipe.simul.copasi.check.check_model_file(model_filename, task_name='')¶

Load the model into COPASI and checks whether the given task can be executed

Parameters:
  • model_filename – the filename to a COPASI file
  • task_name – the task to check
Returns:

a boolean indicating whether the model could be loaded successfully
sbpipe.simul.copasi.check.severity2string(severity)¶

Return a string representing the severity of the error message :param severity: an integer representing severity :return: a string of the error message

sbpipe.simul.copasi.copasi module¶

class sbpipe.simul.copasi.copasi.Copasi¶

Bases: sbpipe.simul.simul.Simul

Copasi simulator.

model_checking(model_filename, task_name='')¶

Check whether the Copasi model can be loaded and executed correctly.

Parameters:
  • model_filename – the COPASI filename
  • task_name – the task to check
Returns:

boolean indicating whether the model could be loaded and executed successfully
